The real reasons for the gender pay gap - Bali Haque and Dr Michael Johnston https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/the-real-reasons-for-the-gender-pay-gap-balie-haque-and-dr-michael-johnston/Z27HU4E5M5HYDM77VXM6RU42ME/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/the-real-reasons-for-the-gender-pay-gap-balie-haque-and-dr-michael-johnston/Z27HU4E5M5HYDM77VXM6RU42ME/ Bali Haque and Dr Michael JohnstonOPINION: It is easy to misunderstand the gap's cause if we don’t compare the right things. Wed, 11 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 The gender pay gap is far more attributable to men and women and women choosing different kinds of work and having different average levels of experience than it is to bias or sexism, Bali Haque and Dr Michael Johnston say.
